structure.unit: ARTICLE XXVII. Miami-Dade County TOURIST DEVELOPMENT COUNCIL

text.section:
Sec. 2-252. Compensation of members.
Members of the Miami-Dade County Tourist Development Council shall serve without compensation, salary or remuneration of any nature, but the County Commission may provide in the annual County budget sufficient funds for the reasonable and necessary expenses incurred by the Council in performance of its duties and functions.
